reviews.review: Класс

Шедевр игропрома. Игра из списка "must play" для уважающего себя геймера, подававшая лихо закрученный сюжет в шутере от первого лица до того, как это стало мэйнстримом. Создана на все времена, ибо отлично играется и спустя десятилетие после выхода. Игра продвинувшая вперед жанр и всю игродельную кухню в целом задав стандарт качества. 

10 красных монтировок из 10
Лучша игра в своем роде!

Что? Кто? Где? Уже?  Нет времени, нет дел,нет работе - все отдать игре. Купил, засел вечером и вспомнил ... что уже утро! Разве можно удивить игрой? Играя каждый вечер, во множество игр, в течении многих, почти 40-ка лет, когда уже выросли почти два поколения , уже думаешь что все - наелся и вряд ли что может удивить или заинтересовать. Что может быть лучше старого доброго Half-Life2 - только он сам.
答主今年18，第一次玩半条命系列应该是初中，比起一些老玩家应该算很晚了吧。从一代到重制版，再到二代，二代第一、第二章，这游戏陪伴了我太多。在那个CF泛滥的时代，这个游戏的细腻以及逼真的物理引擎让我着迷。从现在看来，这个游戏丝毫不失为一个诚意满满的游戏！我真的很想玩，半条命3！
Хотелось бы увидить 3 часть  ;)
Играл в пиратку, наконецто купил Оранж Бокс, это несомненно шедевр игровой индустрии в котором графика 2004 года до сих пор смотриться отлично.

Sin duda alguna el juego que forjo caracter a muchos de nosotros en nuestra juventud, el salto que hubo de Half Life 1  a Half Life 2 fue BRUTAL en aquellos años.

De repente uno esta jugando Counter Strike 1.6 con sus amigos en los viejos negocios donde se rentaban computadoras y PUM el nuevo y flamante Half Life 2 apenas instalado en la maquina del dueño del establecimiento, nunca se olvidaran esos dias donde despues de la escuela y hacer la tarea era obligatorio ir a jugar Half Life 2 y ver cual seria el descenlase de nuestro querido amigo Gordon, en ese tiempo era una patada en las bolas el sistema de Steam, tardaba horas en abrir la interfaz (en ese tiempo de color verde olivo) solo para poder jugar Half Life 2 y los combates casi hasta media noche en el Deatmach.

Sin duda el mejor juego que ha existido, en el cual no importa cuantas veces lo retomes siempre te da la satisfaccion como aquel primer dia en el que pudimos dsifrutarlo.
10 Алекс из 10 Алекс
Великая игра!
В ожидании цыфры 3

Half-Life 2 is the sequel to its very successful predacessor Half-Life, and takes on a variety of genres in gameplay throughout the game. You're immediately thrown into City 17 by the mysterious G-Man and have to figure out what exactly happenned to Earth while you were in suspended stasis. The game changes from a first-person shooter to a puzzle game then a driving game along the story and doesn't fail to do so. If you've been playing TF2 or CSGO for a while and haven't picked this game up yet, I would highly recommend doing so, or better yet, buy the Orange Box Bundle which is only double the price of Hallf-Life 2 and get the entire Half-Life 2 anthology plus the very first Portal and TF2 premium.

Holy crap, who HASN'T played HL2? It's one of those games that you can just sit down and say "This is just beautiful." Until the combine surround you and you can't do anything about it, so you die and realize you forgot to save, so then you have to start at the beginning. Love those moments. 
Anyways, get HL2, and you'll basically having the best time of your life.

This game is simply legendary and I still hope for Half-Life 3 to be released. Although it's pretty old now and the graphics aren't on the level of today's games, Half-Life 2 is still fascinating and a genre of it's own. Played it through twice.

If I had to describe this game in a single phrase, it would be "ahead of its time". It still looks and plays modern despite its age. None of the facial expressions or AI feel dated. Never once did I think to myself, "this game was clearly made some time ago". I might just be out of the loop on cutting-edge game graphics, but graphically speaking, Half-Life 2 could have been released yesterday.

Barring a few poorly-lit sections where exploration seemed to be the point (which I will say is a bad combination), I was never at a loss for where to go next. Valve's intuitive level design makes the game's pacing very fluid, both in the easy way a player can navigate any given level and in the steadily increasing challenge of the firefights. The only frustrating difficulty spike was near the very end of the game. All I will say about the final boss is that it was a letdown given the fantastic quality of earlier boss encounters.

The levels do fail the AI a bit, as firefights in the city sections' cramped corridors and bombed-out buildings rarely give the masterful enemy scripting a time to shine, but on the open coastline sections, the soldiers you fight get to strut their stuff a bit more. They work in squads, covering each other and challenging the player in ways that still feel intelligent today. While many of the soldiers fight in similar ways, the inclusion of shotgun-wielding baddies that are far more aggressive adds some spice to combat, and all the other enemy types are unique. Some are a little too bullet-spongy, but so are you. Whether this is a positive or negative depends on personal taste.

The story is a mediocre plot told masterfully. If summarized, it goes something like "you're a one-man army killing space facists", but that doesn't do the execution justice at all. The fantastic and diverse sound design, the unique and psychologically stimulating visuals for each enemy type and the villains' uniforms, vehicles, and installations, the grounded and emotionally charged voice acting, and the expressive facial animations all help sell this implausible, fairly tired premise.

If whoever wanted my review distilled in a phrase decided they wanted a single-word evaluation of this game, it would be "polished". Nothing in this game feels half-finished or low-effort. Every single model, animation, and level in this game feels handcrafted in the same way a family vineyard's wine or a custom car does. This game is a labor of love that exceeded the expectations I had for it, and none of the minor flaws I ran into can stop me from unashamedly extolling this game's virtues. Go buy Half-Life 2.

Отличная игра, которая не устаревает и по сей день. Когда был сделан мод synergy, с помощью которого стало возможным играть с друзьями, халфа заиграла новыми красками. В игре есть единственный, но очень большой минус - неоконченный сюжет. Но, к сожалению, вопреки всем обещаниям и ожиданиям, продолжения все нет.

Söyleyecek fazla bir şey yok. Kaç kere bitirdiğimi bilmiyorum. Half Life'ı sadece multiplayer Crossfire'dan ibaret sananların çok olduğu bir dönemde hikaye modunu oynayıp bitirmiş ve çok beğenmiştim. Half Life 2'nin zamanına göre müthiş bir sıçrama yapan grafikleri ve Source oyun motoru ise zaten çıtayı çok daha yükseklere çıkardı. Hikaye de sağlam olunca ortaya hala dillerden düşmeyen ve serinin 3.sünü beklediğimiz bu efsane oyun çıktı.

Ne diyeyim. Hâlâ oynamayan varsa muhakkak oynasın (evet 13 yıllık oyun ve evet bugün bile oynanır).
Вечная не умирающая классика!

Jogo perfeito, já zerei varias vezes e nunca enjoei, jogo lançado em 2004 mesmo assim ainda surpreende jeito de contar a história revolucionário e gráficos a frente do seu tempo e super bem optimizado, as expansões (EP1 e EP2) são até difíceis e completas, a Valve ta de parabéns só é uma pena que nunca fazem uma trilogia para continuar as Histórias de suas obras primas.
К тому времени когда у меня будут внуки моих внуков они все равно будут ждать 3 часть

Tytułem wstępu "Kto nie grał , niech lepiej zagra " . Half-Life 2 to gra ,która dobrze zapamiętałem i przechodząc ją nie dawno nie zawiodłem się . Fabularnie , fizycznie i graficznie (2004) jak na 2017 rok gra dalej wygląda dobrze i ciśnie na głowę gry tego typu z tamtego okresu . Sam byłem tak zafascynowany fabułą , że CIĄGLE grałem tylko w tą grę  i nie mogłem się oderwać . Polecam to tym , którzy szukają gier WCIĄGAJĄCYCH . Jak dla mnie 10/10 .. Super gierka .. z resztą .. nie bez powodu społeczność ,która ogrywała HL1 oraz HL2 z dodatkami pytali co rok Gabe'a Newell'a ~(Kiedy wyjdzie Half-Life 3 ) . Fizycznie wiadomo .. silnik source .. niby taki prosty i stary ale jak na dzisiejsze czasy wciąż dobry ! Jeśli w to nie grałeś to powiem Ci tylko tyle .. Lepiej w to zagraj ! Zrozumiesz , że również tak jak reszta społeczności będziesz chciał zagrać w HL3 , które raczej NIE wyjdzie . ;(           10/10 - Half Life 2 , EP.1 , EP.2

Вылуплялись детеныши хедкрабов,

И весят монхеки над землей.

Выходил на берег с монтировкой,

На высокий берег на крутой.

Выходил и песню заводил он,

Про альянс, про Алекс и про ГрОб.

Про того, кого уже убил он,

Про того, кого убить не смог.

Всех врагов кромсал он на салат,

Монтировочкой работал на убой.

В новапроспект он устроил ад,

Учудив кровавый им забой.

É um ótimo jogo, a trilha sonora dele é bastante imersiva e tambem bem completa. Você consegue facilmente jogar já que não existe qualquer dificuldade que não seja aprendida em alguns minutos de jogo, sem contar com os graficos que mesmo com passar dos anos ele ainda parece bem atual, tudo que tem nesse hambiente é bom, precisa de algumas horas pra zerar mas dependendo isso pode demorar bastante tempo, o jogo é ótimo não tem muito o que falar, apenas JOGUE!

Señores creo que estamos todos de acuerdo con que este título marcó un antes y después.
Por este motivi creo que todos deberíamos norminar este grandeza a la categoría de premios steam "Number Penaut".
Dicha categoría es exclusiva a juegos de absoluta y reitero ABSOLUTA grandeza.
 
De modo que a la hora de nominar este juego seleccionen la última casilla de propuesta y escriban (Number Penaut), ya es hora de poner las cosas en su sitio.
Este juego es lo que hace falta en tu deprimente vida, PER-FEC-CIÓN
